rows.title: üé∂ Devin Cuddy Duo at The Ship
rows.description: Devin Cuddy Duo finally return to St John‚Äôs Newfoundland. Join them at The Ship on November 8th, 8pm with Jeff Giles opening the evening. The Devin Cuddy Duo is coming back to St John‚Äôs NL, and to The Ship Pub on November 8th. We are also ecxited to have Jeff Giles opening the show. Gonna be a big night! Bio: From the moment Devin Cuddy was drawn to playing music, he was determined to get as close as possible to the sources of all the sounds he loved, whether they were made by rock and roll‚Äôs founding fathers, the Grand Ole Opry‚Äôs honky tonk heroes, or Jelly Roll Morton and the kings of jazz. Devin developed a blend of these sounds, that is uniquely his own, on a weekly basis at Toronto‚Äôs Cameron House, which he still considers his home base. These days this Juno-Nominated artist takes his sound from Coast to Coast to Coast.

rows.title: üßò Dance & Soothe
rows.city: Barnes Road, St. John's, NL, Canada
rows.description: A collective experience of moving, breathing, connecting with Soma Breath¬Æ, Somatic Dance, Sound Healing, and Reiki. Join Joan Dohey of Time to Heal, Nadine Emberley of Reiki on the Rock, and Tina Pomroy of Going Om as they guide you through an evening of release, connection, and inner peace. Your journey will begin with Soma breath guided by Nadine to activate your calming, parasympathetic nervous system and begin to release what is no longer serving and connect to your deeper Self. With an awareness of your inner world, your journey will continue with cultivating embodiment through somatic movement and dance. A curated playlist and Tina‚Äôs healing voice will guide you as you explore and release body tensions and emotional patterns and connect to layers beneath the physical surface. Your evening will end with Joan‚Äôs soothing crystal bowl and muscial sound bath as your body, mind, and spirit melt into a blissful, soothing space, while Tina and Nadine offer Reiki love and optional soothing touch to each of you.
rows.tags: Miscellaneous

Backed by a dynamic 4-piece band with mesmerizing dance choreography, this immersive experience transports audiences straight into a Taylor Swift concert! rows.title: ü§£ Ron James - The Noise Between Our Ears
rows.description: With a seismic level of socio-political change shifting a reality we long took for granted, what better way to process the cacophonous overload of stimuli than in the language of laughs. ‚ÄòFresh out of the wrapping‚Äô content skewers everything from the tyrannical Tangerine Genie south of the border looking to turn us into the 51st state, to aging Baby Boomers now but twenty years away from roaming ‚Äòthe home‚Äô in their Led Zeppelin onesies, just one more sing a long away from taking a Stairway to Heaven! Alongside these macro issues is a window on the daily trials of a technologically compromised ADHD addled adult, who came of age in a day when a ‚Äòhash tag‚Äô was something you got after getting too close to the hash knives! Whether getting comedic mileage with classic bits on generational differences in families then and now; teacher terrors of public-school days; hand me-down hockey gear; party hearty camping trips with pals in those ‚Äòbullet proof days of yore‚Äô, there‚Äôs something for everybody. ‚ÄòUltimately though, ‚ÄòThe Noise Between Our Ears‚Äô sees Ron as the ever struggling ‚ÄòEveryman‚Äô, doing his best to make sense of a world off kilter while bedeviled by forces beyond his control, where airlines constantly lose luggage, stock portfolios nosedive, mortality‚Äôs the new reality and the barber spends more time trimming your ears than he does your head!
rows.tags: Comedy

rows.title: üõçÔ∏è Etsy Holiday Market
rows.city: 245 Freshwater Rd, St. John's, NL, Canada
rows.description: There‚Äôs no escaping the holiday markets this time of year. The Etsy Holiday market pops up at the Farmer‚Äôs Market from 10am-4pm with no admission to browse the curated local vendors. Join us for the Etsy St. John‚Äôs Holiday Market taking place at 245 Freshwater Road, home of SJFM. Shop from local Etsy makers & vintage sellers alongside popular farm & food vendors from St. John‚Äôs Farmers‚Äô Market. FREE admission. Family-friendly. Licensed service animals permitted, all other pets are prohibited indoors. Accessibility: Automatic doors, accessible washroom, wide aisles, no steps. Fragrances will be present from 2-4 candle, bath & beauty vendors, but we otherwise discourage our vendors & customers from wearing strong scents and perfumes. Music will be playing during the market.
rows.tags: Holiday Events, Markets
